description: This is the main React component 'App' which serves as the root of the front-end application. It manages navigation between different sections of a portfolio website, including smooth scrolling and theme setting. The component imports various sub-components responsible for distinct features such as Navbar, Introduction, Expertise, SkillsTimeline, ProjectsShowcase, RateSection, ContactSection, and Footer.

methods.name: App()
methods.description: Main functional React component that renders the portfolio webpage and manages section navigation.

methods.name: scrollToSection
methods.description: Function to scroll smoothly to a specified section based on the section name parameter.
